folder: Atlantic Ave. & Flatbush Ave., Brooklyn, NY
text:
Times Plaza, converging point of Atlantic, Flatbush, and Fourth Avenues, showing the B. M. T. elevated on Flatbush Avenue and the I. R. T. subway entrance on Atlantic Avenue. This area is also a terminal for street car lines and buses.

June 15, 1940
Views 1,2,3

P. L. Sperr
